entries.meaning: (US) Someone who makes weapons, especially nuclear weapons.
examples: Von Neumann, who believed that mathematics grew best when nourished by ‘a certain contact with the strivings and problems of the world,’ became a great friend of the weaponeers.

entries.meaning: A member of an aircrew responsible for the weapons.

verbs.description: weaponeer (third-person singular simple present weaponeers, present participle weaponeering, simple past and past participle weaponeered)

entries.meaning: (military) To provide with appropriate weaponry for use against the chosen targets.
